name: Balls of Steel (itch) (Jollo)
description:
This game was developed for Mini Jam 54: Memories.
Game Duration: 5-10 Minutes

At first you play a simple pinball game, but if you lose, the ball has to slay his way back up to the pinball machine, so you can enjoy some more pinball.

Over time more and more enemies will try to hinder you.

Pinball:

Hold Space - Launch

A + D Flipper

Hell:

WASD + Mouse - Movement

PRESS R TO RESET THE GAME

We made this game in a team of 2. 

We had no artist and for one of us it was the first time working with Unreal.

We couldnt make everything happen we wanted to, but are still satisfied with what we achieved.

Enjoy!
